variable.name: RUN_REFRESH
variable.value: cmd /X /C "cd /D $[? EMPTY_REFRESH_FOLDER] [${EMPTY_REFRESH_FOLDER}] [\"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\"] && \"${VSSCMD}\" cd ${OPTIONS} \"${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" && $[? EMPTY_REFRESH_FOLDER] [] [\"${VSSCMD}\" workfold ${OPTIONS} \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" &&]

${SHELL} -c "cd $[? EMPTY_REFRESH_FOLDER] [${EMPTY_REFRESH_FOLDER_\/}] [${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE}] && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} cd ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${PROJECT_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} && $[? EMPTY_REFRESH_FOLDER] [] [${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} workfold ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} &&]

variable.name: RUN
variable.value: cmd /X /C "(mkdir \"${ROOTDIR}${PS}${MODULE}${PS}${DIR}${PS}.\" 2>nul || echo.) && cd /D \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" cd ${OPTIONS} \"${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" workfold ${OPTIONS} \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" &&

${SHELL} -c "mkdir -p ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}${PS}${MODULE_\/}${PS}${DIR_\/}${PS}.${QUOTE}; cd ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} cd ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${PROJECT_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} workfold ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} &&

variable.name: RUN_SILENT
variable.value: cmd /X /C "(mkdir \"${ROOTDIR}${PS}${MODULE}${PS}${DIR}${PS}.\" 2>nul || echo. >nul) && cd /D \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" >nul && \"${VSSCMD}\" cd ${OPTIONS} \"${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" >nul && \"${VSSCMD}\" workfold ${OPTIONS} \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" >nul &&

${SHELL} -c "mkdir -p ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}${PS}${MODULE_\/}${PS}${DIR_\/}${PS}.${QUOTE}; cd ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} cd ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${PROJECT_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} >/dev/null && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} workfold ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} >/dev/null &&

variable.name: RUN_NMK
variable.value: cmd /X /C "cd /D \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" cd ${OPTIONS} \"${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" workfold ${OPTIONS} \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR}] []\" &&

${SHELL} -c "cd ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} cd ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${PROJECT_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} workfold ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? DIR] [${PS}${DIR_\/}] []${QUOTE} &&

variable.name: RUNCDM
variable.value: cmd /X /C "(mkdir \"${ROOTDIR}${PS}${MODULE}${PS}.\" 2>nul || echo.) && cd /D \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" cd ${OPTIONS} \"${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" workfold ${OPTIONS} \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []\" &&

${SHELL} -c "mkdir -p ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}${PS}${MODULE_\/}${PS}.${QUOTE}; cd ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} cd ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${PROJECT_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} workfold ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []${QUOTE} &&

variable.name: RUNCDM_SILENT
variable.value: cmd /X /C "(mkdir \"${ROOTDIR}${PS}${MODULE}${PS}.\" 2>nul || echo. >nul) && cd /D \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []\" >nul && \"${VSSCMD}\" cd ${OPTIONS} \"${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []\" >nul && \"${VSSCMD}\" workfold ${OPTIONS} \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []\" >nul &&

${SHELL} -c "mkdir -p ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}${PS}${MODULE_\/}${PS}.${QUOTE} >/dev/null; cd ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} cd ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${PROJECT_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []${QUOTE} >/dev/null && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} workfold ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []${QUOTE} >/dev/null &&

variable.name: RUNPATH
variable.value: cmd /X /C "(mkdir \"${ROOTDIR}${PS}${MODULE}${PS}${PATH}${PS}.\" 2>nul || echo.) && cd /D \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" cd ${OPTIONS} \"${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" workfold ${OPTIONS} \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH}] []\" &&

${SHELL} -c "mkdir -p ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}${PS}${MODULE_\/}${PS}${PATH_\/}${PS}.${QUOTE}; cd ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} cd ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${PROJECT_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} workfold ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH_\/}] []${QUOTE} &&

variable.name: RUNPATH_NMK
variable.value: cmd /X /C "cd /D \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" cd ${OPTIONS} \"${PROJECT}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH}] []\" && \"${VSSCMD}\" workfold ${OPTIONS} \"${ROOTDIR}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH}] []\" &&

${SHELL} -c "cd ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} cd ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${PROJECT_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH_\/}] []${QUOTE} && ${QUOTE}${VSSCMD_\/}${QUOTE} workfold ${OPTIONS} ${QUOTE}${ROOTDIR_\/}$[? MODULE] [${PS}${MODULE_\/}] []$[? PATH] [${PS}${PATH_\/}] []${QUOTE} &&

property.name: inputDescriptor
property.value: LABEL(getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(VSS_GET),ACCESSIBILITY(DESCRIPTION_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(ACSD_VSS_GET))) PROMPT_FOR(ROOTDIR, getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(COMMAND_VSS_GGET_WORK), "", ACCESSIBILITY(MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_COMMAND_VSS_GGET_WORK_mnc)), SELECTOR_DIR) PROMPT_FOR(ENVIRONMENT_VAR_SSDIR, getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(COMMAND_VSS_GGET_SSDIR), "", ACCESSIBILITY(MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_COMMAND_VSS_GGET_SSDIR_mnc)), SELECTOR_DIR) PROMPT_FOR(PROJECT, getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(COMMAND_VSS_GGET_PROJECT), "$/", ACCESSIBILITY(MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_COMMAND_VSS_GGET_PROJECT_mnc))) PROMPT_FOR(VSSCMD_EXE, getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(VSS_GGET_Command), "C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio\VSS\win32\SS.EXE", ACCESSIBILITY(MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_COMMAND_VSS_GGET_EXE_mnc)), SELECTOR_FILE) PROMPT_FOR(USER_NAME, getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(VSS_GGET_UserName), "", ACCESSIBILITY(MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(VSS_UserName_Mnemonic))) ASK_FOR(RW_MODE, getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(COMMAND_VSS_GET_RW), "false", ACCESSIBILITY(MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_COMMAND_VSS_GET_RW_mnc)), "-W", "") ASK_FOR(RECURSIVE, getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(COMMAND_VSS_GETR_Rec), "true", ACCESSIBILITY(MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_COMMAND_VSS_GET_Rec_mnc)), "-R", "-R-") PROMPT_FOR_EXPERT(GET_OPTIONS, getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(COMMAND_VSS_GET_Options), "-GWA", ACCESSIBILITY(MNEMONIC_getBundle(org/netbeans/modules/vcs/profiles/vss/config/Bundle).getString(ACS_COMMAND_VSS_GET_Options_mnc)))
